posts.post_content:
Like another comment I read on Nissa, Sorin's +1 ability creates tokens. Sure, they might not be that powerful, but they can often serve as chump blockers or even attackers, especially when you use his  
-2 ability. The vampire tokens can protect Sorin while you prepare for his -2 or even his -6 ability. Don't forget that they will gain you life. with enough +1/+0 emblems, you can gain massive amounts of life and formidable attackers.  
  
Sure the white/black combo might interfere with your deck building a bit, but this is why you have Orzhov. With extort, you can gain even more life and delay until his secondary or ultimate ability. If you are worried about blockers or hasted attackers, Blind Obedience might be good to put in the deck. Although, with his new colors, Vampire Nocturnus may not be the best pick to put in a Vampire deck anymore. Maybe a Moat or protection sphere to stall.  
  
Great Planeswalker. Great art. I hope that Tibalt dies swiftly.

Sure the white/black combo might interfere with your deck building a bit, but this is why you have Orzhov. With extort, you can gain even more life and delay until his secondary or ultimate ability. Pairing the worst planeswalker ever (no not this!) to one of the best is dumb. I would probably rate this in the top 5 planeswalkers of all time. That -2 is incredible.

Posted By: SyntheticDreamer (3/19/2013 9:31:32 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: A must have for Orzhov decks in standard. He's not insane to get out, and once he does then you're creating a wall of chump blockers. Then you have the emblem thing, which you can use to make those chump blockers even stronger. The ultimate is honestly more useful for creatures then planeswalkers (unless you're taking a [Gideon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gideon)), but it works out well. Awesome planeswalker through and through. Love using him.
posts.html:
A must have for Orzhov decks in standard. He's not insane to get out, and once he does then you're creating a wall of chump blockers. Then you have the emblem thing, which you can use to make those chump blockers even stronger. The ultimate is honestly more useful for creatures then planeswalkers (unless you're taking a Gideon), but it works out well. Awesome planeswalker through and through. Love using him.
